## AttributeConstraint enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum AttributeConstraint 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  CombinationUnique | <code>&quot;CombinationUnique&quot;</code> | A set of attributes, that have this constraint, should have different combinations in each variant |
|  None | <code>&quot;None&quot;</code> | No constraints are applied to the attribute |
|  SameForAll | <code>&quot;SameForAll&quot;</code> | Attribute value should be the same in all variants |
|  Unique | <code>&quot;Unique&quot;</code> | Attribute value should be different in each variant |
